item.description: Regal Queen of the Blues will be performing her originals and her style of blues rock, funk soul music for you to dance and even sing along on some with her and her band. Richard Malcolm and Bob Abruzese will be holding down the in the pocket rhythm with a special award wining guitarist. Hope to see you there.,
item.why: The REGAL Queen of the BLUES- Shirley Lewis show band will be performing with a rocking good time blues show.with her band.
item.name: Come to the Next Page
